item.title: Summer Research Assistant Week 1
item.author: cooper.wallace5@gmail.com (Cooper Wallace)
item.description: This Summer I was given the chance to join the Computer Science department at Grant MacEwan as a STEP (Summer Temporary Employment Position) Research Assistant. I’m rather excited to be working along side my Professors over the summer, and I can’t wait to see the things that I’ll be working on over the next 4 months! During my first meeting with the departments chair, Cam Macdonell, I had expressed interest in starting a Blog.
